participant_1.background:
I am grateful for my family, and I enjoy spending time with them on holidays.
I will do laundry and spend time with my family.
I'm going to the gym to lift weights, eat some healthy food, and then watch Magic Mike.
i am a grandparent at 44.
I love to feel the warm sun on my skin and the salty sea air in my hair.

participant_2.background:
I have a book of nursery rhymes for my infant son.
i have 5 brothers and sisters.
I am still single, because I have been on my own for too long, to give my heart away to just anyone.
i teach kindergarten.
i have a job as an it agent.

content.text: I'm doing good! How about you?
I'm great, thanks! What are you up to this weekend?
I'm going to the beach with my family!
That sounds fun! I'm going to the gym to lift weights, eat some healthy food, and then watch Magic Mike.
That sounds like a great way to spend the weekend!
Thanks! I'm looking forward to it. What do you like to do on the weekends?
I usually like to spend time with my family, or go for walks in the park.
That sounds nice! I love spending time with my family too. Do you have any hobbies?
I like to read, and I also like to play the piano.
That's great! I like to read too. What are some of your favorite books?
I like to read a lot of different genres, but I especially like historical fiction and fantasy.
I love historical fiction too! What are some of your favorite historical fiction books?
I love the Outlander series by Diana Gabaldon, and I also love the Pillars of the Earth series by Ken Follett.
I've heard good things about those books! I'll have to check them out.
